FUNC.NAME: upcEanConvertRssToUpcEan
FUNC.PATH: Barcode Scanner\Decoder and Parameter Tags\Upc Ean
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is used to set the upcEanConvertRssToUpcEan property.

PARAM.NAME: upcEanConvertRssToUpcEan
PARAM.DESC: If true, RSS barcodes will be converted to UPC/EAN format. For this setting to work UPC/EAN symbologies must be enabled.

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner and sets upcEanConvertRssToUpcEan property
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="allDecoders:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="upcEanConvertRssToUpcEan:true"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner or Imager module and device that supports UPC-EAN and RSS decoders
